content: *pretty basketweave pattern and warm autumnal color with clusters of big bold acorns and leaves approx 12 in 30 5 cm x 15 in 38 cm x 2 in 5 cm shown in patons shetland chunky #03520 russet 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook patons yarns * skill level intermediate materials patons shetland chunky 100 g/3 5 oz main color mc 03520 russet 5 balls and patons shetland chunky tweeds 100 g/3 5 oz contrast a 67031 earthy brown tweeds 1 ball size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge small amount of stuffing for acorns written directions are provided in pdf download october 2008 french version october 2008 sac fourtout de moisson 1 *free membership to patonsyarns com required for download * 1 http //www patonsyarns com/data/pattern/pdf/patons_shetlandchunkyweb1_cr_bag fr_ca pdf
